faqs.question: What are my services?
faqs.answer: I provide video, editing and drone services with high quality with the goal of capturing special moments, details and emotions.

faqs.question: What's my style?
faqs.answer: My style is very classic and elegant, focusing on capturing small details and enormous emotions.

faqs.question: Can I get drone footage?
faqs.answer: Yes, always. Drone footage will enrich your story on a cinematographic level, unless the atmospheric conditions are not suitable or the locations are not within regulated and legal locations.

faqs.question: What equipment do you use?
faqs.answer: I use Canon R and R6 cameras, a Mavic 2 Pro drone, a Gimbal stabilizer, lights, and Lavalier microphones.

faqs.question: Do you have backup equipment?
faqs.answer: Yes, of course. Having backup equipment is essential, especially on a very important event to ensure we are always recording the moments. In this regard, I have extra batteries, memory cards, cameras and lenses and a video assistant.

faqs.question: What's the quality of the video?
faqs.answer: I work with 2 types of resolution: 1080 (Full HD) and 4K.

faqs.question: Can I get the RAW files?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can. If you choose the package that includes the Raw files, you can get them.

faqs.question: Do you travel for weddings?
faqs.answer: Yes, I travel within Portugal and abroad.

faqs.question: Do we need to pay for travel expenses?
faqs.answer: No, if your wedding is in Portugal. For destination weddings abroad, I will charge you the flight and accommodation.

faqs.question: Do you require a deposit and when is the balance due?
faqs.answer: Yes, to secure the date a deposit of 50% of the quote is required, and I will send the video once the balance is due.

faqs.question: What do you do if it rains on our wedding day?
faqs.answer: I am quite adaptable and can move quickly from an outdoor set-up to an indoor one. Majority of wedding venues offer indoor locations for the wedding and reception as a backup to accommodate for poor weather.

faqs.question: How long in advance can we book your services?
faqs.answer: I recommend you to book my services 6 months prior to the wedding day.

faqs.question: Can I have a second videographer at my wedding?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can. I have a list of a few videographers that sometimes work with me on weddings, and I can organize it for you. However, this service is not included in the price of my packages.

faqs.question: How long until the video of my wedding is ready?
faqs.answer: The video will be ready in about 4 to 6 weeks after the event. However, if you need it earlier, there will be a fee to get it quicker.

faqs.question: Once I get the video ready, am I able to make adjustments?
faqs.answer: Yes, you are. You have one opportunity to make adjustments. Once you exceed that attempt, there will be a cost for it.

faqs.question: What time do you arrive on the wedding day?
faqs.answer: I arrive at least 2 hours before the ceremony to set up all my equipment and study the best frames to film.

faqs.question: Do you have a portfolio?
faqs.answer: Yes, I do. You can check my YouTube channel, website and Instagram.

faqs.question: How do we hire you?
faqs.answer: Using the contact menu on top of the page and get in touch with your requirements and all the information you already have regarding your wedding.

faqs.question: Is there a contract?
faqs.answer: Yes. I will send you the contract form via email. You must fill up the form with all information required, status of your wedding, and all other pertinent information and send it back to me.

faqs.question: What are the payment methods?
faqs.answer: You can pay with Revolut and Bank transfer.
